    • isValidBuildLocation

      public static boolean isValidBuildLocation(Room room, Coordinate coordinate, TunnelGraph graph, int sideLength)
      Checks whether a room may be placed at a given coordinate or not.
      Parameters:
      room - the room to be placed
      coordinate - the coordinate where the room shall be placed
      graph - the graph the room shall be added to
      sideLength - the graph's side length
      Returns:
      true if the room may be placed at the coordinate or false otherwise
